iati-activity.title: Support to NHRC
iati-activity.description: Short Description: Support to the Rwandan National Human Rights Commission Long Description: The ouputs foreseen in the project document were to establish a process to define human rights priorities in Rwanda; to accomplish global; departmental and provincial action plans which update the RHRC’s three-year action plan and identify the programme priorities based on an analysis of the human rights situation in Rwanda; to establish regular monitoring process regarding the plans; and to prepare a report reflecting the results of monitoring.

iati-activity.title: Support to Aid Effectiveness
iati-activity.description: Short Description: Support to Aid Coordination; Harmonisation and Alignment for Development Effectiveness in Rwanda Long Description: Interim support to aid coordination; harmonisation and alignment for development effectiveness in Rwanda. This project builds on the achievements of DEX project no. 00040553; with a view to ensuring greater national ownership of the aid effectiveness agenda and a gradual transfer of capacities and responsibilty for the management of Rwanda's aid coordination architecture to national entities.

iati-activity.description: Short Description: The purpose of this budget revision is to allow continuity of the activities for the TOKTEN project in January and February 2006 as the annual work plan is being finalised.

iati-activity.description: Short Description: Long Description: Capacity of MINICOM and its agencies strengthened in the effective management of the IF process

iati-activity.title: Democratic Dialog Civil Socty

Long Description: National policies; legislations and programmes have integrated and implemented key recommendations from debates and researches on peace and democratic society.

iati-activity.title: Capacity Building for the Ombu
iati-activity.description: Short Description: This project is aimed at building the capacity of the Ombudsman Office to attend to claims of social injustices at all levels and put in place structures and strategic framework guiding its actions.

iati-activity.title: Support the National Institute
iati-activity.description: Short Description: Long Description: By 2011; the National Institute of Statistics of Rwanda (NISR) capacity strengthened and mechanisms put in place to track and monitor the economic development and poverty reduction performance indicators in the country following a successful implementation of the institute’s Strategic Plan (2007-2011).

iati-activity.description: Short Description: Long Description: (As per project document) - Provide technical assistance to Parliament Commissions. Provide support to the establishment of a parliamentary radio.

iati-activity.description: Short Description: Provide training of the grassroots conflict management actors; conduct ingando; and internal staff strengthening. Long Description: As per the project document: Institutional capacity development and the organization and training of civic groups and grassroots leaders in conflict management.

iati-activity.title: Support to Ombudman Office
iati-activity.description: Short Description: appropriately capacitated office of the Ombudsman that has prevented and fought corruption in accordance with its strategic plan Long Description: (as per the project document) - Capacity Building for the Ombudsman Office staff; Surveys/Studies on Corruption Conducted; Sensitization and public involvement in fighting corruption; media and communication campaigns.

iati-activity.title: Support to HCP
iati-activity.description: Short Description: An appropriated capacitated HCP which plays a role in both insuring the independence; and the responsibility of the press in accordance with internationally accepted professional standards.

iati-activity.title: Support National Women Council
iati-activity.description: Short Description: Effectiveness and capacities of constitutionaly mandated institutions to increase state accountability; responsiveness & transparency in an engendered manner enhanced

iati-activity.title: Disaster Emergency Coordinati
iati-activity.description: Short Description: To support national and local capacities in coordinating and leading the response and preparedness process Long Description: UN assistance will be focused in coordinating the response to the floods between GoR; agencies; NGOs and Districts and bolstering the capacity of the DMU; key ministries and Districts in Emergency Preparedness and Response (EPR)._x000D__x000D_ _x000D__x000D_ In addition to providing emergency materials; there is clear need to conduct rapid and comprehensive assessments to ensure that:_x000D__x000D_ _x000D__x000D_ 1) Response and early recovery in the flood-affected sectors is well coordinated and responsive to the needs of the people and integrating the environmental dimension_x000D__x000D_ 2) National and local capacities can be properly strengthened (prevention; preparedness and response). Gishwati and Volcanoes are identified as most vulnerable and priority areas._x000D__x000D_ _x000D__x000D_ A consultancy will in particular focus on strengthening national and local essential capacities in contingency planning; including risks and situational analysis; man-made and natural disasters scenarios mapping; response plan; coordination mechanisms; basic information management and reporting. In addition; local capacities will be strengthened in emergency management; reporting and coordination.

iati-activity.title: MDG Campaign
iati-activity.description: Short Description: Long Description: - Understanding of the MDGs among the population at grassroots levels increased_x000D__x000D_ - Co-operation and coordination among UN Agencies and partners in acheiving MDGs enhanced

iati-activity.title: Participatory Rural Developmen
iati-activity.description: Short Description: Long Description: Improve access to and from Coffee Washing Stations for Coffee farmers to stimulate production and marketing of Coffee and contribute to other economic activities in terms of improving trade such us trade of other commodities and access to banking services.

iati-activity.title: Capacity Building for a Decent
iati-activity.description: Short Description: Capacity building for a Decentralisewd HIV Response Long Description: National and decentralized institutions are fully able to plan and coordinate the multi-sectoral HIV response.

iati-activity.description: Short Description: Long Description: Strengthening the capacity of the Rwanda National Police in community policing and crime prevention

iati-activity.description: Short Description: Long Description: To mobilize the youth to conduct environment protection activities so that they can enjoy income generating opportunities.

iati-activity.title: Amélioration Quartiers Précair
iati-activity.description: Short Description: Projet d'Amélioration des Quartiers Précaires des villes secondaires de la Province de l'Ouest Long Description: Le projet Amélioration des Quartiers Précaires des villes secondaires de la Province de l'Ouest" a pour but de promouvoir le développement des infrastructures de base que sont les réseaux de voirie; de drainage des eaux pluviales; d'alimentation en eau potable et la préservation d'un environnement sain et durable en vue de promouvoir la croissance socio-économique des populations des quartiers précaires de Kamembe (Rusizi) et Kiniha (Karongi). En plus; le projet renforcera les capacités des villes cibles en matière de gestion et de protection de l'environnement urbain. Il donnera un appui au MININFRA dans la mise en oeuvre de la politique nationale de l'urbanisation et de l'habitat."
